title: dozerz
author: dozerz
content: lot 1: microsoul pbc coin funded (redeemed)a real piece of bitcoin collectible history, this was the first coin created by microsoul. with a mintage of 100, 62 funded and 38 unfunded. the private key is engraved on the back in this example.starting bid - 0.01lot 2: encyclopedia of physical bitcoins and cryptocurrenciesthe encyclopedia we all know and love by elias with his signature, special edition first print 17/100. in excellent condition and still in original envelope.starting bid - 0.01lot 3: 2014 1 troy oz 999 silver vericion in capsule, includes 2 certs and sticker as pictured.made by socal with only 100 made they were sold for 0.1btc on the forum.starting bid - 0.01lot 4: hong kong bitcoin round with cerificate, marked coinspot trading limitedcontains 80g silver at 999starting bid - 0.005STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT 1: 0.001 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: Jul 26th, 2023, 19:00:00 EDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: BTC - bc1qqy0sdc3fzzk5sgxdpmkmfffl9g0u6aelej2555SHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Have not seen a that particular coin from Microsoul in quite awhile! I really cant believe its already 10 years old as well.  As the encyclopedia says...this was his first attempt on making coins and I also do not see the small devil on the coin as well making this even more a collectable from the coins he produced!    Goodluck to the winner! This is nice addition for any collection or microsoul enthusiast!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: July 21, 2023, 08:18:44 AMLast edit: July 24, 2023, 03:21:42 PM by bitbollo
comments.body: @dozerz (@elianite) this edition of encyclopedia include also signatures of coinmakers provide as extra or it's another version? (thanks @minerjones for your answer)

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on July 21, 2023, 08:18:44 AM@dozerz (@elianite) this edition of encyclopedia include also signatures of coinmakers provide as extra or it's another version? That is a different edition.. the hardcover signature version had these
